## Introduction

This method execute create a LSTM neural net capable of predict a stock time series using Keras.

I wrote about LSTM and time series on [this article](https://rpubs.com/marcosmhs/rede_lstm_predicao_dolar) in RPubs site.

The code of the method could be downloaded on Github.
